wikipedia_page.main: Olgierd Porebski (6 September 1922 – June 1995) was a British fencer. He competed in the individual and team sabre events at the 1952 and 1956 Summer Olympics.

response: * Roger Tredgold, Olgierd Porebski, Bob Anderson, William Beatley, Luke Wendon
